content.description: Speed is steep and overhanging. The route starts from the left side of the 1st bolt and traverses up and right. This route is considerably harder with a lower right side of the first bolt start. It shares anchors with 1 other route - the route directly right (name unknown).
content.protection:
5 bolts with 2 Mussy hooks.

Note: all bolts and hangers were also replaced (8/30/21), at the same time the route has had its own set of new anchors with Mussy hooks installed. It still shares anchors with the unknown route to the right.
content.location: With 6 total routes at the upper wall, this route is the first route starting from left to right.

content.description: Pat's Pissed is steep and overhanging in sections. The rock quality is great. This has some face climbing and some minor hand jamming.
content.location: With 6 total routes at the Upper Wall, it is the 5th route from the left or the 2nd route from the right.

content.description: On Ramp is steeper than might be expected for a 5.8. The rock quality is great. This has some face climbing and some minor hand jamming.
content.location: With 6 total routes at the upper wall, it is the furthest right route.

content.description:
Steep and overhanging in sections.

This is the best route on the upper wall.
content.protection:
4 bolts with 2 Mussy hooks

Note: 4 new bolts and hangers were recently (8/11/21) installed, also the anchor bolts replaced at the same time.
content.location:
With 6 total routes at the upper wall, this route is 3rd from the left or 4th from the right.

Between "Father Pinch" and "Pat's Pissed"

content.description:
Father Pinch is steep and overhanging. The route starts to the right of

Mother Jugs

. The crux of the route is between the 3rd and 4th bolts with a left hand pinch and a right hand throw for the right side of the horizontal seam. The 4th bolt clip could be from left hand side of the horizontal seam or the right hand flake left of the 4th bolt. It's not over after the 4th bolts clip. There are hard moves until the finish.
content.protection: 4 bolts with 2 Mussy hooks and chains.
content.location: With 6 total routes at the upper wall, this route is the 4th from the left or 3rd from the right.
